name: igshortcuts
title: Google™ Shortcuts
description: Display all Google services as a single space-saving dropdown panel
author: Andy Portmen

preferences.name: alerts
preferences.title: Google Alerts individual toolbar icon:
preferences.description: Get email updates on the topics of your choice (restart required).
